required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on June 04, 2014
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Phase Three Clinical Trials of Trivalent Rotavirus Genetic Reassortment Vaccine

lead_sponsor.agency: Center for Disease Control and Prevention, Henan Province

clinical_study.source: Center for Disease Control and Prevention, Henan Province

brief_summary.textblock: Assessment and evaluation the rotavirus gastroenteritis prevention effect and severe rotavirus diarrhea reducing effectiveness of human body, which inoculate trivalent rotavirus genetic reassortment vaccine.

clinical_study.study_design: Allocation: Randomized, Endpoint Classification: Safety/Efficacy Study, Intervention Model: Single Group Assignment, Masking: Double Blind (Subject, Caregiver, Investigator), Primary Purpose: Prevention

arm_group.description: 2ml of rotavirus genetic reassortment vaccine by mouth every month for three month
2ml of placebo by mouth every month for three month
